001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.NonexistentErrorRequest;
009
010import java.util.HashMap;
011import java.util.Map;
012
013/**
014 * With an ErrorCode of INVALID_PARAMETER, requestCodeId contains the request opcode which failed
015 *
016 * There are really two different ErrorResponse's -- one with a size of 2, (for currentStatus)
017 * and one with a size of 26 (for control / signed messages, called ErrorResponseControl by tandem)
018 */
019/**
020 * With an ErrorCode of INVALID_PARAMETER, requestCodeId contains the request opcode which failed
021 *
022 * There are really two different ErrorResponse's -- one with a size of 2, (for currentStatus)
023 * and one with a size of 26 (for control / signed messages, called ErrorResponseControl by tandem)
024 *
025
026 *
027 * <br>
028 *
029 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.NonexistentErrorRequest}, opCode 77, size 2
030 *
031 * <br>
032 *
033 * 
034 * <table border='1'>
035 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>77</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>2</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.NonexistentErrorRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * </table>
041 */@MessageProps(
042    opCode=77,
043    size=2, // or 26
044    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
045    request= NonexistentErrorRequest.class
046)
047public class ErrorResponse extends Message {
048    private int requestCodeId;
049    private int errorCodeId;
050    private byte[] remainingBytes;
051    private ErrorCode errorCode;
052
053    public ErrorResponse() {}
054
055    public ErrorResponse(int requestCodeId, int errorCodeId) {
056        parse(buildCargo(requestCodeId, errorCodeId));
057    }
058
059    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
060        // disabled for ErrorResponse since it can be of size 2 or 26
061        //Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
062        requestCodeId = raw[0];
063        errorCodeId = raw[1];
064        errorCode = ErrorCode.fromByte(errorCodeId);
065        if (raw.length > 2) {
066            remainingBytes = Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 2);
067        }
068        cargo = raw;
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * <table border="1">
073     * <caption>Byte layout for ErrorResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
074     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
075     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) unknownByte0</code></td></tr>
076     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) errorCodeId</code></td></tr>
077     * </table>
078     */
079    public static byte[] buildCargo(int unknownByte0, int errorCodeId) {
080        return Bytes.combine(
081                new byte[]{ (byte) unknownByte0 },
082                new byte[]{ (byte) errorCodeId });
083    }
084
085    public int getRequestCodeId() {
086        return requestCodeId;
087    }
088
089    public ErrorCode getErrorCode() {
090        return errorCode;
091    }
092
093    public byte[] getRemainingBytes() {
094        return remainingBytes;
095    }
096
097    public enum ErrorCode {
098        UNDEFINED_ERROR(0),
099        CRC_MISMATCH(1),
100        TRANSACTION_ID_MISMATCH(3),
101        BAD_CARGO_LENGTH(4),
102        BAD_OPCODE(6),
103        INVALID_REQUIRED_PARAMETER(7),
104        MESSAGE_BUFFER_FULL(8),
105        INVALID_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR(9)
106        ;
107
108        private static final Map<Integer, ErrorCode> idMap = new HashMap<>();
109        static {
110            for (ErrorCode item : values()) {
111                idMap.put(item.id(), item);
112            }
113        }
114
115        ErrorCode(int i) {
116            this.id = i;
117        }
118        private final int id;
119
120        public int id() {
121            return id;
122        }
123
124        public static ErrorCode fromByte(int id) {
125            return idMap.get(id);
126        }
127    }
128}
